name: 應變分析
description: The goal of the course is to teach students theoretical fundamentals of strain analysis, fundamentals of the deformation and tensions theory, reologic models of real geological objects and massifs, criteria of mechanism of strain, mechanical mathematical setting of tasks and methods of solving them using modern computer technology.
goals: 描述地質構造應變分析的原理與原則。  1.瞭解構造作用之過程及其結果  2. 瞭解各種不同比例幾何現象的意義  3. 在受變形作用的地區用來解釋面狀與線狀構造的來源  4. 由應變狀態的分析重建古地層剖面，並估計原始厚度  5. 估計區域性位移，並與褶皺斷層互相對照，解釋大地構造運動
